sentence.text: We hypothesized that newly identified genetic risk factors for the general African American population could also negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II laboratory biomarkers known to contribute to the clinical disease expression of SCA, including variants influencing the white blood cell count and the development of albuminuria and abnormal glomerular filtration rate.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: The cytolysis G1 polymorphism, an identified risk factor for non-diabetic renal disease, was associated with albuminuria.
